Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students who need to communicate over a long distance.
The student can illustrate the string telephone device connecting the two students to show how it helps them communicate.
The student can show in the drawing that the device uses sound through the string to communicate.
The student can depict how the device is made using only the materials provided, like cups and string.
The student can demonstrate through the drawing that the device is effective at sending or receiving information over the distance between the two students.
The student can include in the drawing a brief explanation or label showing how using the string telephone helps people communicate over distances.
